tag_list: product-management, product-marketing, problem-solving, creative-direction, user-experience, qualitative-market-research, quantitative-research, online-advertising, art-direction, ab-testing, graphic-design, brand-development, integrated-marketing, online
overview:
Product Manager, Product Marketer, Creative Director

Brand strategy and integration: Positioning language, voice and tone, iconography development and integration, lifestyle photography and typography development and integration

Consumer website and consumer electronic device user experience (PS3, Wii, Xbox, Samsung, LG, Roku and others): Information architecture, Sign up flow, Product description (how it works), photography, motion graphics, positioning and offer language

Traditional Channels: OOH (billboard, transit), Print (print ads, consumer electronics package inserts, on-box promotion, partner advertising and point of sale support, DVD mailer member campaigns) and TV (motion graphics and end slate language and design)

Online Channels: Display banner adverting, affiliate advertising support and online video and email (member welcome series, ongoing streaming engagement, consumer email marketing (rejoin and re-marketing)

PR: Press release review and editing and launch event creation and implementation in 7 countries
